Analyze the following text: A device for measuring the power consumption 1 measuring a real power transmitted by the power line 3 the power line 3 comprising a first power wire 31 and a second power wire 32 the device for measuring the power consumption 1 comprising a detecting unit and a calculating unit 2 the calculating unit 2 electrically coupling to the detecting unit the calculating unit 2 obtaining a power factor according to a sensing voltage signal SV and a sensing current signal SI generated by the detecting unit the calculating unit 2 obtaining the real power according to the sensing voltage signal SV the sensing current signal SI and the power factor the device for measuring the power consumption 1 being characterized by the detecting unit having an electric field detector 11 and a magnetic field detector 12 used for being disposed adjacent to the first power wire 31 and the second power wire 32 wherein the electric field detector 11 has a first electrode 111 and a second electrode 112 the magnetic field detector 12 has a first coil 121 and a second coil 122 wherein the first electrode 111 and the second electrode 112 are respectively disposed adjacent to the first power wire 31 and the second power wire 32 the first electrode 111 and the first power wire 31 create a first voltage level V1 at the first electrode 111 according to capacitive effect the second electrode 112 and the second power wire 32 create a second voltage level V2 at thesecond electrode 112 according to capacitive effect the sensing voltage signal SV is the potential difference between the first voltage level V1 and the second voltage level V2 wherein the first coil 121 and the second coil 122 are respectively disposed adjacent to the first power wire 31 and the second power wire 32 winding direction of the first coil 121 is contrary to winding direction of the second coil 122 the first coil 121 and the second coil 122 are coupled in series based on the same sensing current direction for obtaining the sensing current signal SI corresponding to the currents on the first power wire 31 and the second power wire 32.
